description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Order made to approve the acquisitions of the immovable Properties in Badulupitiya Wata Ravum Road in Pahala Raja Veediya in Heennarang Kumbura (Keppetipola, Mawatha) D/S Division, Badulla, Badulla District for the Constructions Under Badulla Urban Waste water and Sewerage Project  and in Kannathiddy, Jaffna D/S Division, Jaffna District for the Constructions under Jaffna-Kilinochchi Water Supply and Samtation Project
